rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3562, 3563, 3564, 3953}
For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3563} Do Any co-req (I/W) unit in {MID3104} Otherwise true
(Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MID2006, MID2105} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MID2004})

description: This unit introduces students to childbearing and emergency birthing obstacles that women may experience. Midwifery and obstetric management of childbearing obstacles will be explored. Emphasis is given to the collaborative role of the midwife, referral, use of medical technology, obstetric intervention, and the implications for women, their babies, and midwives.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
